channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - hypervisor

item.title: Comparing performance with sysbench: cpu and fileio
item.description: Being busy with virtualization and additional security measures, I frequently come in contact with people asking me what the performance impact is. Now, you won't find the performance impact of SELinux here as I have no guests nor hosts that run without SELinux. But I did want to find out â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
